explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions using Support Vector Machine (SVM) as one of the data mining techniques for predicting bank financial strength ratings.
explanations.SVM: This is an abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is explicitly mentioned in the paper as a method used.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions using Artificial Neural Network (ANN) as one of the data mining techniques for the prediction task.
explanations.classification: The paper involves predicting bank financial strength ratings, which can be considered a classification problem where banks are categorized based on their financial strength.
explanations.regression: The paper uses ordered logistic regression, a type of regression analysis, to estimate a suitable model for rating prediction.
